name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Willie WHITE, Jr., Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Willie WHITE, Jr., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of March 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superi- or Court is VACATED and the matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for .proceedings consistent with Commonwealth v. Mouzon, 812 A.2d 617 (Pa.2002), (Opinion Announcing Judgment of Court).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
818 A.2d 1285
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Willie WHITE, Jr., Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 14, 2003.
